com.example.lab_net

Class SearchableList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.lab_net.SearchableList

  • public class SearchableList
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class which will allows a list to be referenced and fed results from a database query.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SearchableList.ExperimentDisplayAdapterSegment 
      private class  SearchableList.ListDisplayAdapterSegment 
      private class  SearchableList.SearchableDisplayAdapter
      A SearchableDisplayAdapter is the general class that will handle all searchables and put them into a displayable form.
      private class  SearchableList.SearchProgressListener
      A simple listener class to watch the queries and then execute a callback when all queries are completed.
      private class  SearchableList.UserDisplayAdapterSegment

      • SearchableList

        public SearchableList(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity parentActivity,
                      android.widget.ListView toWrap,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Searchable> data)
        Creates a new SearchableList from a ListView and an ArrayList
        Parameters:
        parentActivity - The parent AppCompatActivity for the SearchableList to use when changing activities.
        toWrap - The ListView to reference.
        data - The list that holds the data that the ListView displays.
